Html:
When trying to add Photo content using FCKeditor I get the above..


"..... Suystem.InvalidOperationException: Using themed css files requires a header control on the page.
(e.g. <head runat+"server%qu...."

Try this! In the file FCKeditor/filemanager/browser/default/connectors/aspx/connector.aspx add following:

<html>
<head runat="server"></head>
</html>

Works for me.

Thanks BB,

Tried that and it now allows browse and image upload
However it provides this url to image
~/Files/Image/B1.jpg

but does not display image ??

Removed ~/ allowed image display in browser
but not in FCKeditor itself
